div.p: Indicates whether the plan is currently being acted upon, represents future intentions or is now just historical record.
This value set defines its own terms in the system http://hl7.org/fhir/care-plan2-status

tr.td: The plan is in development or awaiting use but is not yet intended to be acted upon.
The plan is intended to be followed and used as part of patient care.
The plan is no longer in use and is not expected to be followed or used in patient care.
